dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's a big move for Kazakhstan's athletic future, you know? The law's all about restructuring how sports are funded and prioritized.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a big move for Kazakhstan's athletic future, you know? The law's all about restructuring how sports are funded and prioritized.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The law aims to improve state policy in the field of physical culture and sports development. The authorized body will be responsible for developing national and regional lists of priority sports, determining the list of elite (high-performance) sports, and establishing the procedure for their funding from the state budget.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and it specifically mentions that funding foreign legionnaires from the state budget is now banned. That's a pretty significant shift in policy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and it specifically mentions that funding foreign legionnaires from the state budget is now banned. That's a pretty significant shift in policy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: A ban has been introduced on funding foreign legionnaires from the state budget and funds of quasi-public sector entities.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, so public money is now focused on four key areas—elite sports, mass sports, operations of public institutions, and infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, so public money is now focused on four key areas-elite sports, mass sports, operations of public institutions, and infrastructure.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: From now on, public funding will cover four areas: elite sports (including priority sports), operations of public sports institutions, mass sports, and development of sports infrastructure, Akorda's press service noted.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And they're defining elite sports based on international achievements, like the Olympics, Paralympics, Asian Games… even national traditional sports.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And they're defining elite sports based on international achievements, like the Olympics, Paralympics, Asian Games... even national traditional sports.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Priority sports will be approved based on achievements on the international stage. These include sports featured in the Olympic, Paralympic, Deaflympic, Asian, and Para-Asian Games, as well as national sports.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: They've also improved the accreditation system for sports federations, splitting them into national and local levels now.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: They've also improved the accreditation system for sports federations, splitting them into national and local levels now.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Provisions regarding the accreditation of sports federations have been improved, with federations now categorized as national and local, the Akorda press service stated.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: I noticed they're introducing unified athlete training standards too, which include patriotic education components. That's interesting—mixing sports with national values.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: I noticed they're introducing unified athlete training standards too, which include patriotic education components. That's interesting-mixing sports with national values.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Unified athlete training standards have been developed, including measures to strengthen traditional values and patriotic education.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the authorized body can now take action against anti-doping violations, which is a step forward for integrity in sports.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the authorized body can now take action against anti-doping violations, which is a step forward for integrity in sports.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The authorized body is now also empowered to take measures against violations of anti-doping regulations.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like a comprehensive overhaul, really trying to streamline everything from grassroots to the elite level.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like a comprehensive overhaul, really trying to streamline everything from grassroots to the elite level.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. The full text is gonna be published in official print media soon, so we might get even more details then.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. The full text is gonna be published in official print media soon, so we might get even more details then.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The full text of the law will be published in official print media.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Definitely a law to keep an eye on as it rolls out.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Definitely a law to keep an eye on as it rolls out.
